text: Area studies, also called regional studies, is a field of research for cultural, federal, geographical, and national regions. It exists as a description for many different fields of research, looking at both how people live and their culture. Most colleges or universities such as Harvard, provide a area studies program for students. They usually include international relations, strategic studies, and other related programs. == References == == Other websites == * * Center for Interdisciplinary East and South - East Area Studies, Lund * School of Interdisciplinary Area Studies, Oxford * Observatory of International Research (OOIR): Latest Papers and Trends in Area Studies Category:Ethnography Category:Cultural anthropology
